item.title: Building a Comfortable Dev Environment
item.description: Being a software developer can be overwhelming at times. There are an endlessly diverse set of tools, technologies, languages and frameworks to choose from. To make it worse, that list grows larger and larger each day. Tools like git, docker, docker-compose, kubernetes, ssh, curl, sed, awk, grep, jq etc. are all tools we use multiple times a day. Most of these tools have a small subset of commands / flags or use-cases that we use most often.
